title: Meet Ras Modi: The Young Dreadlock Farmer Transforming Sustainable Agriculture#SustainableFarming

tasks.task: Engage in machinery operation and field preparation for planting.
subtasks: Sit in the cab of the tractor.
Start the tractor engine and engage the transmission.
Use the steering controls to initiate movement in the intended direction.
Adjust the seed boxes to ensure proper spacing and alignment.
Apply tension to the seed planter's conveying system.
Monitor the planter's operation for correct seed distribution.
Communicate with crew member via hand signals to coordinate speed and direction adjustments.
Refill the seed hopper as necessary.
Adjust the seed metering mechanism for accurate planting.
Use the GPS receiver to guide the tractor along planned rows.
Adjust the planter's depth and tension using hydraulic controls during operation.
Inspect the planting equipment for malfunctions and perform on-the-spot repairs.
